WRITING.TEXT: Wait, who is getting unlimited data? Grandfathered p,and aside, I thought all plans were metered? Have I missed something?

The models were surprisingly good for what I was expecting. Too bad there's nothing more to go off of here.
Tech demo? I guess.
Almost "Hello World", but nothing I would go out demonstrating to people.

The smell that hits you stepping off a train in the Stuttgart Bahnhof. Pretzels, trains, magazines. It all comes together in a strange way there. Something I'd pay money for if the stink were bottled...
Get rid of the shitty striping around the forearms, calfs, and shoulders.

Wait.
You know Fabio's last name...?
??!

Great nod to g1 with this new guy, but...
Where is MP Blaster??

Not sure when all this began, but if you pay Fanatic attention to Ferrero related News articles, you get something like this semi-annually in a Newsfeed or two:
http://komonews.com/news/offbeat/seattle-men-busted-at-the-border-with-illegal-candy-11-21-2015

Kinder Surprise will get you locked up in El USA.
Also, their production lines have apparently contaminated quite a bit of Ferrero product with an allegedly carcinogenic byproduct.
Shame too, cuz I'm stuck deep in the US, grew up overseas and know Kinder Eggs to be the finest treat in human history.
Though they are banned as a choking hazard, I truly suspect they were banned due to efforts by effectively greasy Cracker Jack lobbyists. The same greasy Cracker Jack lobbyists will undoubtedly downvote this post.
Watch.

Downtown. Tall, old building.
I was taking a quick nap after work and woke up wondering if I was back in AIT, with my Battle Buddy jacking off in his bunk below me.
I wasn't.
Earthquake didn't Cross my mind until after I looked around the apartment searching for the source of the slight shaking.
Really mild.
Got confirmation when I saw this on my front page.
First earthquake. I've been in, around, and over this state for twenty years. Not a single Tornado.

Marquee. Modular movie theater.
Go!
Every goddamn time. That, and Charlottes Web. Nothing is likely to make me weep, except for those two things. Both, I cannot look away from, and both destroy my non-crying state.

Favorite character? G1 Starscream. Backstabbing Weasel. A trait i find admirable. Plus, the voice and his animated design were Tops.
Favorite toy? G1 Bombshell. That cool little fucker went everywhere with me when I was between six and nine. I've bought probably a dozen since in various states of repair. Hands down the coolest looking G1 figure. Both modes.
Why do the handlebars not turn, AAAAAAAND... What bicycle-related game do I have to fork over 400 Bucks to play?

This is the most impressive third party prototype I've seen. Might just be the one to get me to start puking cash on these guys and their ultra-high end knockoff/homages.
200 bucks-ish. Fair estimate?
Full movie link, free! https://youtu.be/97IF_6w98P4

WRITING.TITLE: Kung Fu flick filmed in Wichita could have been "huge"

WRITING.TEXT: Why is that Alien missing all those teeth?
Deep Roy

Your local Pizzeria will soon be receiving a C D order via certified Mail.
Thanks for pointing this out.

Pizza folding.
It's a tactic deployed to scarf down twice the pizza of the person(S) sharing the pie with you. It's greedy, contemptable, and if these were old enough days, this behaviour would have ended in Mortal duels.
Rarely does my blood boil so hard as the day I catch some scumbag, jamming slices down their gullet at twice my pace.
I could kill!
Edit: letter
Day made. Danke!

Why is the cheese not melted? Looks fresh from a refrigerator.
Also, such a good job applying the shellac. Rarely do I ever See such a gloss on my Burgers over here in the US.

Jailbreak your Wii, install WiiMednafen. I am emulating just about every Rom I've tried, and if I really want to, i can install VC versions of TG16 Games. Cost? Nothing but the price of an SD Card and the time it took to install some files on it.
Military Madness is G.O.A.T on Turbo Grafx

Ah, yes... The old Left Butt Cheek Sneak.
Classic pose.

In order of release:
Iron Man TFA Winter Soldier Guardians Of The Galaxy Civil War
Close runner up: Ant Man
Don't get me wrong, I was thrilled too see the Avengers finally assemble, but I didn't give a damn about Loki's motivations, the Chitauri were bland as moms mashed potatoes, and I really hate Ruffalo's Banner and Hulk ("Puny God" bit aside). Cap' didn't get the love he deserved, and his costume was horrible. I walked in fearing the worst, and walked out feeling like I didn't get spanked as hard as I should have for burning down the barn, though I still got spanked. In someone else's hands (Favreu?) Things would have probably clicked better. Not the worst movie I've seen, but far from the quality I got from all of the Steve Rogers flicks.
I should also note that before MCU, Captain America was one of my least favorite Marvel characters, regardless of his status as one of Marvel's top tier guys.

Yes. This. About the only nice touch he put on AOU was the bit with lifting the hammer leading into Visions introduction. The first Avengers flick turned out better than I expected, but I still place it in the same league as Thor 2, or lesser of the rest of the lot. Never been a fan of his directorial crap. Glad to see he's no longer the head cheese of MCUs efforts.
People who like Journey, and liars.
Best, MK 42 Worst, Avengers Cap'
